com.project.mantle_v1.fileNavigator

Class FileDetailActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
              • com.project.mantle_v1.fileNavigator.FileDetailActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback

    public class FileDetailActivity
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
    An activity representing a single File detail screen. This activity is only used on handset devices. On tablet-size devices, item details are presented side-by-side with a list of items in a FileListActivity.

    This activity is mostly just a 'shell' activity containing nothing more than a FileDetailFragment.
